channel.title: Rune c bow help! someone plz!
channel.description:
I made my rune c bow 500 range bonus but its not hitting high like its hitting 15s, how do i make it hit 60s?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 06:35:38 pm[/size][hr]Im using a delta source

item.title: Rune c bow help! someone plz!
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

this is what you really should do
go to client java and search for
Code:

    if(!hasCrystalBow() && (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837))

there should be a code saying 1.25D or something
raise the 1.25 (dont mess with the D)

Read full topic
item.source: Rune c bow help! someone plz!

item.title: Rune c bow help! someone plz!
item.dc:creator: @burst_str burst str
item.description:
@burst_str wrote:

that makes it hit 60s right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 06:40:24 pm[/size][hr] if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13800 && specialAmount <= 49) { // runecbow
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage(“You do not have enough special energy left.”);
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13800 && specialAmount >= 50) { // runecbow
startAnimation(427);
RCSpecial();
specialDamage = 30 + misc.random(35);
specialAmount -= 50;
}[code/]
makes hit 60s right[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 07, 2009, 06:41:44 pm[/size][hr]when i added to client and complied it had 8 errors

Read full topic
item.source: Rune c bow help! someone plz!

item.title: Rune c bow help! someone plz!
item.dc:creator: @bryan_m bryan m
item.description:
@bryan_m wrote:

yes add something to item.cfg and add this to your client

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13800 && specialAmount <= 49) { // runecbow specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13800 && specialAmount >= 50) { // runecbow startAnimation(427); RCSpecial(); specialDamage = 30 + misc.random(35); specialAmount -= 50; }[code/]

Read full topic
